Reviews.Title: “Almost a decent price for a pretty good hotel!”

Reviews.Title: “Very dated but clean, good price & very Convenient”

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights christmas shopping trip tiny 2 beds sheet blanket bedding dated furniture tv deco bathroom looked wardrobe clean strong detergent smell window padlocked bars little unnerving fire sufficient simply lay heads hard days shopping breakfast simply toast cereal sufficient staff friendly helpful bad reviews updating

Reviews.Title: “Average room, horrible blankets”
Reviews.Author: JFK8
Reviews.Content: typical lobby marble floors grand spacious beds smelled strong detergent particularly nice smoke presume bed horrible blankets 2 blankets cold advice skip breakfast serve allowed called food tip french coffeehouse corner road grove

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel, scary guests!!”
Reviews.Author: katrinawhite123
Reviews.Content: booked hotel near cheap im bad reviews people expecting price heart london bad experience fellow guests lot noisy hours morning locked metal bars windows balcony outside hot night curtains managed window slightly anyway detail boyfirend hotel sex bed window remember thinking throughout noises outside coming heard chair move outside window realised neighbours sat outside window looking metre whispered boyfriends ear watching holiday realised person pretended hadnt noticed carried afterwards jumped quickly light light walked door own funny scary

Reviews.Title: “i would not class this hotel as 1 star could not stay 1 night walked out .”
Reviews.Author: welshgirl055
Reviews.Content: booked hotel booking agency called quick book iwould expected basic paid cant call basic 2 beds bathroom looked cupboard walls dirty marks carpet stains bad husband walked stay landed hotel 2 nights staying seedy hotel please advise dont stay hotel worth paying extra

Reviews.Title: “Exactly what was expected for the price...”
